section.title: Remove Halt User Account
section.para: Removes the halt user account. As a general precaution, default system accounts that are not used or needed should be removed. The more accounts that are present on the system, the more opportunities an attacker has to gain access or information about your system.
It is recommended to remove the halt user account unless it is required by your system.

listitem.para: CC-3 - Secure Configurations for Hardware and Software on Laptops, Workstations, and Servers
GEN000000-LNX00320 - The system must not have special privilege accounts, such as shutdown and halt.
